comment: * RuleBasedTransliterator is a transliterator * built from a set of rules as defined for * {@link Transliterator#createFromRules(String, String, int)}. * See the class {@link Transliterator} documentation for the rule syntax. * * @author Alan Liu * @deprecated This API is ICU internal only. * @hide Only a subset of ICU is exposed in Android * @hide draft / provisional / internal are hidden on Android

methods.name: protected void handleTransliterate(Replaceable text, Position index, boolean incremental)
methods.comment:
* Implements {@link Transliterator#handleTransliterate}.
     * @deprecated This API is ICU internal only.
     * @hide draft / provisional / internal are hidden on Android

methods.name: public String toRules(boolean escapeUnprintable)
methods.comment:
* Return a representation of this transliterator as source rules.
     * These rules will produce an equivalent transliterator if used
     * to construct a new transliterator.
     * @param escapeUnprintable if true then convert unprintable
     * character to their hex escape representations, \\uxxxx or
     * \\Uxxxxxxxx.  Unprintable characters are those other than
     * U+000A, U+0020..U+007E.
     * @return rules string
     * @deprecated This API is ICU internal only.
     * @hide draft / provisional / internal are hidden on Android

methods.name: public void addSourceTargetSet(UnicodeSet filter, UnicodeSet sourceSet, UnicodeSet targetSet)
methods.comment:
* @deprecated This API is ICU internal only.
     * @hide draft / provisional / internal are hidden on Android

methods.name: public Transliterator safeClone()
